critter.name: Peacock Butterfly
critter.desc: Pretty as a peacock? Bah, I say! The wings of the peacock butterfly may have a pattern similar to that of the beautiful bird... But its forewings are also covered in a dark, velvety hair! You heard right! HAIRY wings! A hair-raising revelation indeed!
critter.quote: I caught a peacock butterfly! Now it's my turn to strut my stuff!
